articles.title: Working as one: How Sâ€™poreâ€™s security forces collaborate behind the scenes to keep the nation safe
articles.content: Over decades, the Home Team has grown into a unified force committed to keeping Singapore safe. Todayâ€™s threats move fast â€“ and so does the Home Team. But the nationâ€™s safety did not happen by chance. Trace some of the Home Teamâ€™s key milestones and developments captured in The Straits Times headlines. From once operating independently to now co-developing intelligent systems across different agencies, the Home Teamâ€™s integrated approach is built on a...

articles.title: I test drove BYD's latest midsize SUV. It accelerates faster than a Porsche Cayenne Coupe S.
articles.content: In April, BYD outsold Tesla in Europe for the first time. Our reviewer was impressed by the midsize SUV's handling. The lineup reflects a strategy designed to match drivers' needs in nearly every stage of life. The midsize SUV has two variants: Premium and AWD Performance. I test drove the higher-end AWD Performance model, which is priced at 219,000 yuan, or about $30,500. In the first half of 2025, BYD overtook Toyota to become Singapore's top-selling car brand

articles.title: Stock markets turn lower as trade deal rally fades
articles.content: Stock markets mostly fell Friday as the latest trade-related rally lost momentum, with investors also digesting a mixed batch of corporate earnings. London and Frankfurt stock markets both fell on Friday, while Paris edged up
